languages.text: "Культистка мертва, текущий глава секты стар — у флагмана есть все шансы постепенно избавиться от ереси самосуда".

traits.locale_text: "Культистка мертва, текущий глава секты стар — у флагмана есть все шансы постепенно избавиться от ереси самосуда".

languages.text: "With the cultist dead and the sect's current leader being old, the flagship has the opportunity to rid itself of the heresy of mob justice."
languages.original_text: "Культистка мертва, текущий глава секты стар — у флагмана есть все шансы постепенно избавиться от ереси самосуда".

traits.locale_text: "With the cultist dead and the sect's current leader being old, the flagship has the opportunity to rid itself of the heresy of mob justice."
"With the cultist dead and the sect's current leader being old, the flagship has the opportunity to rid itself of the heresy of mob justice."

"With the cultist dead and the sect's current leader being old, the flagship has the opportunity to rid itself of the heresy of mob justice."
"With the cultist dead and the sect's current leader being old, the flagship has the opportunity to rid itself of the heresy of mob justice."

languages.text: 「カルト信者は死に、現在の宗派の指導者は老いている。今こそ、この旗艦が衆愚による私刑という異端を一掃する好機だ」
languages.original_text: "With the cultist dead and the sect's current leader being old, the flagship has the opportunity to rid itself of the heresy of mob justice."

traits.locale_text: 「カルト信者は死に、現在の宗派の指導者は老いている。今こそ、この旗艦が衆愚による私刑という異端を一掃する好機だ」

languages.text: "Nun, da der Kultist tot und der aktuelle Anführer der Sekte alt ist, kann das Flaggschiff sich von der Häresie der Lynchjustiz befreien."
languages.original_text: "With the cultist dead and the sect's current leader being old, the flagship has the opportunity to rid itself of the heresy of mob justice."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, da der Kultist tot und der aktuelle Anführer der Sekte alt ist, kann das Flaggschiff sich von der Häresie der Lynchjustiz befreien."

languages.text: « Maintenant que la cultiste est morte et que le chef vieillissant de la secte n'a plus personne à qui passer le flambeau, le vaisseau devrait en profiter pour se débarrasser de l'hérésie de la justice populaire. »
languages.original_text: "With the cultist dead and the sect's current leader being old, the flagship has the opportunity to rid itself of the heresy of mob justice."

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant que la cultiste est morte et que le chef vieillissant de la secte n'a plus personne à qui passer le flambeau, le vaisseau devrait en profiter pour se débarrasser de l'hérésie de la justice populaire. »

languages.text: «Con la muerte de la sectaria y la avanzada edad de su actual líder, la nave insignia tiene la oportunidad de librarse de la herejía que entrañan estos asesinos justicieros».
languages.original_text: "With the cultist dead and the sect's current leader being old, the flagship has the opportunity to rid itself of the heresy of mob justice."

traits.locale_text: «Con la muerte de la sectaria y la avanzada edad de su actual líder, la nave insignia tiene la oportunidad de librarse de la herejía que entrañan estos asesinos justicieros».

languages.text: “那个邪教徒死了，而邪教的现任领袖也已经老了，这艘旗舰终于有机会摆脱暴民正义的异端恶行了。”
languages.original_text: "With the cultist dead and the sect's current leader being old, the flagship has the opportunity to rid itself of the heresy of mob justice."

traits.locale_text: “那个邪教徒死了，而邪教的现任领袖也已经老了，这艘旗舰终于有机会摆脱暴民正义的异端恶行了。”

languages.text: "Tarikatçı öldüğüne, tarikat lideri de yaşlı olduğuna göre sancak gemisi nihayet bu kâfirce güruh adaletinden kurtulabilecek."
languages.original_text: "With the cultist dead and the sect's current leader being old, the flagship has the opportunity to rid itself of the heresy of mob justice."

traits.locale_text: "Tarikatçı öldüğüne, tarikat lideri de yaşlı olduğuna göre sancak gemisi, nihayet bu kâfir güruh adaletinden kurtulabilecek."

languages.original_text: "With the cultist dead and the sect's current leader being old, the flagship has the opportunity to rid itself of the heresy of mob justice."
